body_text:
Century Global Commodities Corporation 			 
 
		 
 
 You are here:  Home   /   Investors   /  Awards and Events Awards and Events 
 
 December 2, 2014 
 Century receives 2014 CCBC Award for Chinese Investment in Canada 
Century has received the Gold Business Excellence Award for Chinese Investment in Canada from the Canada China Business Council (“CCBC”). The award recognizes an organization that has demonstrated ingenuity, success, leadership and commitment involving inbound investment from China, contributing to bilateral economic growth and to the company’s international success. 
 Read more. 
 November 8, 2014 
  Labec Century awarded the 2014 Explorer Of The Year Award, CIM Newfoundland Branch 
Labec Century Iron Ore Inc., a subsidiary of Century Global Commodities Corporation, received the “2014 Explorer of the Year Award” from the Canadian Institute of Mining, Metallurgy and Petroleum – Newfoundland Branch at its annual awards banquet in St. John’s on November 8, 2014. 
 Read more. 
 October 9, 2013 
  Century Iron’s 2013 Iron Ore Conference – Chinese Steel Driving the Global Iron Ore Industry 
Century hosted more than 100 industry leaders, investment brokers, financial analysts and private investors for a half-day conference focused on iron ore, the demand for steel, and the Chinese market. 
 Read more.
